remarks: The restriction of the category of sets to a subset is the category of sets in the subset.  Thus, the ` SetCat `` U ` categories for different ` U ` are full subcategories of each other.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:
resssetc.c $e |- C = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
resssetc.d $e |- D = ( SetCat ` V ) $.
resssetc.1 $e |- ( ph -> U e. W ) $.
resssetc.2 $e |- ( ph -> V C_ U ) $.
resssetc $p |- ( ph -> ( ( Homf ` ( C |`s V ) ) = ( Homf ` D ) /\ ( comf ` ( C |`s V ) ) = ( comf ` D ) ) ) $.
